content:
Some neighborhood cultures view them as
"objects possessed by spirits,"
turning them into objects of fear, or even deifying them with reverence.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Oh, it's actually about lifeless things
being imbued with vitality that shouldn't exist.
Blurring the lines between life and death is never good.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Some supernatural phenomena and mysterious objects are deeply hidden.
Simple observation and deduction
won't help identify them.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Someone once joked that
"Haiyou" Curiosity Shop
was like a retirement home for mysterious objects and strange tales.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I only know the rules of how it works,
but not its inherent secrets,
I once heard humming in the corridors of the curiosity shop.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
"Dust and ashes, falling into the castle.
People come and go, leaving their souls behind."
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
My neighbors used to say
I was dismissive in conversations.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Once, a client suggested
that we become friends.
I didn't understand how to "become" one... {短暂停}it's difficult.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
They exist in human existence.
When you meet them, you'll know.
If you don't, that's okay too.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
So most of the time,
I rely on the reactions
of my short blade "Guaishou".
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I often receive requests to deal with supernatural oddities,
but not all of them
end up being disposed of.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
All they need is a space,
to stay quietly,
or rather, to fade away in solitude.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I'm just keeping watch,
Making sure they behave themselves.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I don't have any secrets,
There's still a lot I don't know,
Including this "Yet Another" Curiosity Shop.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I...{短暂停}
Never went to school.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content: <color=#695c3a>When did we reach Bond Level 4?</color>
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
The vitality that clings to lifeless things
will also "fade away"
once its source is gone.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
It must be a human voice.
Because my short blade "Kaishu" shows no reaction.
Besides Father and me, is there someone else living in the shop?
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I've given it some serious thought,
This kind of behavior indeed,
Doesn't follow society's unwritten rules.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content: <color=#695c3a>When did we reach Bond Lv. 4?</color>
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content: <color=#695c3a>When did we reach Bond Lv. 4?</color>
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I had my doubts before,
since the "Kaishirei" itself
seems like something out of a ghost story.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
About where I grew up,
And the Curiosity Shop,
I'm trying to figure out, {短暂停}how to talk about this.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content: ...{短暂停}If you see a short blade like this "Strange Head" hanging in front of a house while traveling... (pulls out "Strange Head") don't go inside.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
So I'll take some time,
To think about what to say when we meet again.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Oh, I'm not good at small talk.
When communicating with clients,
I try not to stray from what I've planned to say.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I see students hate going to school,
Don't want to do homework, and skip classes.
I guess... it's not a big deal if they don't attend.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content: <color=#695c3a>When did we reach Bond Level 4?</color>
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content: <color=#695c3a>When did we reach Bond Lv. 4?</color>
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I cannot comprehend it,
Because it sounds like
A tragedy about extinction itself.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Looks like some folks here are from the Academia.
I've been there before.
Oh, right - for a commission.
info: 闲聊-定制话题1-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content: <color=#695c3a>When did we reach Bond Lv. 4?</color>
